scripts.win:ios:uat: powershell write-host -fore White -back DarkRed Running iOS app is not supported on Windows OS.
scripts.win:ios:stg: powershell write-host -fore White -back DarkRed Running iOS app is not supported on Windows OS.
scripts.win:ios:prd: powershell write-host -fore White -back DarkRed Running iOS app is not supported on Windows OS.
scripts.mac:ios:uat: npm run mac:ios:clean && npm run mac:environment:uat && react-native run-ios
scripts.mac:ios:stg: npm run mac:ios:clean && npm run mac:environment:stg && react-native run-ios
scripts.mac:ios:prd: npm run mac:ios:clean && npm run mac:environment:prd && react-native run-ios
scripts.win:build:android:uat: npm run win:environment:uat && npm run bundle:android && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.win:build:android:stg: npm run win:environment:stg && npm run bundle:android && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.win:build:android:prd: npm run win:environment:prd && npm run bundle:android && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.win:build:ios:uat: powershell write-host -fore White -back DarkRed Building iOS app is not supported on Windows OS.
scripts.win:build:ios:stg: powershell write-host -fore White -back DarkRed Building iOS app is not supported on Windows OS.
scripts.win:build:ios:prd: powershell write-host -fore White -back DarkRed Building iOS app is not supported on Windows OS.
scripts.mac:build:android:uat: npm run mac:environment:uat && npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.mac:build:android:stg: npm run mac:environment:stg && npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.mac:build:android:prd: npm run mac:environment:prd && npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.mac:ios:clean: rm -rf ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock; cd ios && pod install && cd ..
